website_summaries.verdict: A compact grind and brew that works quickly to deliver the freshest cup possible.
pros: Can use whole beans or grinds
Can deliver a very fresh brew
Easy to use and clean for re-use
Delivers a tasty cup of coffee in a small amount
cons: Only brews about 2 cups at a time
Doesn't have a place to store beans like other models

customer_reviews.title: Trash!
customer_reviews.text: Update: quit working after 3 months! Love this coffee maker! We were really skeptical for the grinding of the coffee and everything combined thinking that they’re were going to be ground all in it but it was one of the best cups of coffee we’ve ever had! We like how small and compact it is and if we ever have friends over and need to make more the entire machine is able to be completely cleaned and brewing again within less than a minute! It’s so easy my 6 year old can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS COFFEE MAKER!!!
customer_reviews.text: There weren’t any reviews on this when I bought it so I was a little Leary. The first one they sent didn’t work but they replaced it really fast. The design is so simple it’s genius! It makes great coffee and it’s super simple to clean and to load. I’m very pleased with this purchase and have recommended it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: A disappointing machine. You won't  be happy.
customer_reviews.text: Coffee marker supposedly takes beans or ground coffee, but there is not a 'no grind' setting so it grinds already ground coffee. Grounds overflow into the pot while coffee is brewing. The grinder/filter is so small that it only brews very week coffee. Although there is a dial for intensity, it doesn't grind enough coffee for a medium or strong brew. Very disappointed. Had high Hope's for this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: At Last!
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for a coffee brewer just like this for years! I used ground first, then beans; results of both were great! It's perfect for a single person or couple. You can use more or less beans/grounds portions to your personal taste. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked 1 time
customer_reviews.text: We received this product and the packaging was questionable. It appeared to have been re-taped, possibly having been already returned once. We followed all the instructions carefully and it brewed the first pot of coffee great. After that, it would not work. Powers on, but won't grind or brew. Terrible product. Unfortunately we missed our window to return the product due to life circumstances but guaranteed we will NEVER buy this brand again. Also, be aware it brews 4 EURO measured cups, equaling 2 US measured cups.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true?  Yep.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to small coffee maker that would be reliable and take up as little counter space as possible. After maybe 6 or 8 uses, I can honestly say...it doesn't take up much space. The whole thing feels fragile, and has to be set up "just so" for it to work. Even then, the filter system is wonky. The beans get ground fine, but then the water just sits with nowhere to go. Don't waste your time on this, and get a regular coffee machine.
customer_reviews.author: mark smythe

customer_reviews.title: Love this little coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a coffee maker that wouldn't take up a lot of counter space and wasn't too tall. I'd already been through three coffee makers that ended up being too big, too noisy, and one brand that broke twice in six months. I like freshly-brewed coffee (as opposed to K-cups) and have a special blend of two different kinds brewed together. It's delicious every time. One pot is perfect for 1 or 2 people who don't use gigantic mugs. So easy to clean, so quiet when brewing or beeping. Haven't used the grinder yet, but I have no doubt it will be just fine.The Vivante Mini Brew Coffee Maker is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems with the grinder or the strength of the brew. I did have some problems with the spring-loaded stop and pour spout, so I just removed it. It works better without it, in my opinion. Just make sure the drips have finished before pulling out the pot. Overall, this was just what I was looking for, and the small size is great for saving countertop space and for always having a fresh brew.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bird

customer_reviews.title: Spring valve useless, but still good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Love the small footprint and ground coffee setting. Having the choice of ground or beans is nice. Like others here, I gave it one star less for even having the useless spring valve on it. Coffee wouldn't flow into the carafe, no matter where it was positioned, but it's simple to remove and the machine works better without it. It only makes two mugs of coffee, so it's not likely that I'd ever be slipping a cup before it finishes brewing anyway. Overall, it's a nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph G.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of art. Small coffee big taste
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and classy. Says 4 cups but that’s 1 for me. I agree that a timer would be nice. Has grinder so you need to rinse that in sink. I can put a traditional filter underneath steel basket as long as you don’t turn on grinder by using pre ground coffee, which is a bit easier for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: james ford

customer_reviews.title: Despite the instructions
customer_reviews.text: It brews a very good cup. My favorite instruction was "pour jug the hot water" (the coffee is ready to pour). Had to take two "exasperation breaks" while I was wading through the booklet.
customer_reviews.author: W. Curtin

customer_reviews.title: No customer service and no replacement carafe.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this coffee maker! No problems with it at all, until my 3-year-old got ahold of the carafe and dropped it. It shattered. I emailed the company, didn’t hear back, called and left messages and didn’t hear back, emailed again and again and still haven’t heard back... Customer service is nonexistent. It is impossible to make coffee with this machine without the carafe. I have gone weeks now without my morning coffee. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: picky reader

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee brewing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this grind and brew coffee maker for a little more than a month. I really like it. Very convenient and makes a great cup of coffee. I double the grinding to make sure the beans are completely ground. No grinds in my cup. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: It makes coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker after I read the reviews and decided to give it the benefit of the doubt. Honestly, if you're looking for a small coffee maker (for 1.5 US cups; 3 European cups) and you're going to use ground coffee, this is it. If you're looking for a coffee maker (for 2 US cups; 4 European cups) and you're going to use the grinder for whole beans, seek out the Cuisinart. Viante needs to increase the grind time as no matter the amount of coffee beans; it will only grind half, so two stars. The flavor is four stars because if the coffee I chose, not the machine; and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JTM

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: okay, maybe it's me, but why isn't there a coffee pod with this machine? I mean you have to literally take the coffee maker, unplug it, and turn it upside down and rinse the area after each brew? I don't get it. And my coffee is never hot to the taste. I have to heat it in the microwave after each brew. I'm really not kidding on that one. Can someone help me with this? Maybe there is a part missing. This is my first coffee maker with a grinder/brewer 2 in 1. Is there something I'm doing wring? thx, diana
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dyar

customer_reviews.title: One person coffeemaker but great
customer_reviews.text: Debated whether to buy this or not based on some of the negative reviews. Have not had any of the problems mentioned though. The unit is easy to use and very easy to clean, especially as compared to cleaning out a separate coffee unit and grinder unit each day. My biggest complaint was that the two cups it brewed didn't fill my old large coffee cup. So I went to a smaller cup :) I am pretty much completely satisfied with the product after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: ckl

customer_reviews.title: Yup, Spring mechanism Broke
customer_reviews.text: I should have listen to reviews.... 3 days of usage spring Mechanism has broken, or came off and won't stay back in. This is the only way the coffee will drip to carafe. 80.00 not worth 3 days of a working coffee maker.... I am return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Donner

customer_reviews.title: Convenience of compact size and pleasures of fresh ground taste
customer_reviews.text: The compact size allows for use in a variety of locations; I appreciate the taste of fresh ground beans, while acknowledging that medium roast seems to work better since the grinder seems to burn the beans a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker! It was a Christmas gift for my husband and we both agreed we'll never go back to another coffee maker! The only thing I would change is the time setting for keeping your coffee hot. I would make it stay on for at least an hour, because I grind and brew before I get ready for work and sometimes the maker shuts off before I'm ready and then the coffee cools down quicker. But I still love it, fresh coffee is the best!
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaStevenKronenwetter

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little coffee maker, just right for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little coffee maker! I was having so much trouble with making individual cups with paper filters that broke. This one needs NO FILTER because it has a permanent one built in. It's extremely easy to use, with ground coffee or beans. This lets me combine my own flavors and decaf and regular. Doesn't take much room on my counter; didn't have to move a thing. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, leaky, messy.
customer_reviews.text: When the pot sits on the heating unit, it is not pushing up the spring spout to allow coffee to go into pot. The 5 cups of water/coffee overflow above and it leaks onto the burner and on the counter. Lucky to get 1 cup of coffee from 5 cups of water. If I pull the pot out a little, off the burner, just enough, then the coffee slowly goes in...
customer_reviews.author: Einhairyar

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for three weeks and then it just stopped. The water wouldn’t flow into the pot, just got backed up in the basket. I thought it was a one-time thing, so I tried to make another pot and the same thing happened twice. Yes, I followed the directions, cleaned after every use (you have no choice not to), made sure the pot was placed where it was supposed to be, etc. I think it’s just a piece of junk. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: No matter the amount of beans PROPERLY placed, you will always wind up when coffee grounds in your coffee. Furthermore, the coffee drip stopper for not have enough force it tension to have coffee flow into properly placed decanter during brewing which causes coffee to drip into decanter very slowly. This process leaves most of the coffee inside filter basket and not into decanter. In other words, if you put 4 cups of water into brew, in the decanter you will only get about a cup after completed brew cycle. It was too late for me to return because I opened box after return period.
customer_reviews.author: MyPublicName

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini size for us!
customer_reviews.text: This mini coffee pot with built-in grinder is perfect for my husband and I! He drinks regular, I drink decaf, we both like it fresh so we both get what we want without having to make an entire pot.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M Justis

customer_reviews.title: Did not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a few months and it worked well. Then put it away for a while. When I started to use it again, it leaked all over my counter. Did not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: This item didn’t work - I returned it. I so wanted this to work due to its compact size but no such luck.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Diver

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: Omgoodness.. I switched to this from my Keurig, no comparison. Fresh ground coffee is the bomb. Kcups don't compare, I'll never go back to Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Useful for Day-to-Day Coffee
customer_reviews.text: We have a larger grind and brew machine, but wanted something small for weekdays before work. This item does the trick and works as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Find something better.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but produces good coffee. Be patient, though, because you can't sneak a quick pour while brewing without making a mess. Space saving. Small footprint. Don't know how long it will last - plastic & cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Postal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy cup of coffee. Always a terrible mess to clean up. Filter in three separate parts. Still smell plastic off-gas. It looks good, cute and small on the counter but it will be heading to the trash, I cannot give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grossly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same as the $49. machine of a different name. Super cheap manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It works really well and provides a robust cup of coffee from fresh ground coffee beans. What could be better?
customer_reviews.author: Gale Savage

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of them, they work for about 5-7 brews and then no Power!!
customer_reviews.author: TONI

customer_reviews.title: great coffee
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I'm happy with the machine. It's great for 1 or 2 cups of coffee (it's total capacity is 16oz). I like 1 large cup in the morning, so it 's perfect for me because I live alone. Easy to use and clean. The things I'd change are I wish the coffee was hotter and it would be nice if it had a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: What I say above
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful..until the anti drip valve and rubber washer came off and got lost..now machine won't function properly!!!😣😣 for now bad rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return it, still after a month gives a smell of burnt plastic
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Great little coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker has so far performed perfectly. It makes great coffee each and every time!
customer_reviews.author: Philip F. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: worst purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given this product one star I would have. It is overpriced and didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I feel someone may miss out on this fabulous little machine. It's classy, sleek, modern, and elegant. 2 of my friends are purchasing this from tasting the coffee. Cleaning is easy. Just rinse the 3 parts and ready to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking compact coffee maker but it leaks like a mother and the grinder worked only for a few months
customer_reviews.author: Leo.

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: Returning to manufacturer At the price I wasn’t expecting much and got just that.
customer_reviews.author: robert kienle

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mini coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I usually make one or two cups of coffee everyday, Viante CAF-50 is perfect for me. It makes good coffee. It is easy to clean and it looks nice on the kitchen counter top. Everything is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Yuming Chen

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and don't buy this coffee maker!
customer_reviews.author: youngb804

customer_reviews.title: compact
customer_reviews.text: if counter space is at a premium and you need to fit an appliance below the wall cabinets, this is the coffee grinder/maker for you.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing except in size it only makes 2 cups at time
customer_reviews.author: bader alazzam

customer_reviews.title: good little machine that makes good fresh coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like its small footprint on my counter. I think it's a nifty design. I like that it can start with either beans or ground coffee. It doesn't keep the coffee very warm very long.
customer_reviews.author: PBL

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: To small, I wish they could have a bigger one but it works perfect, over all I would recomended
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Calderon

customer_reviews.title: TASTE
customer_reviews.text: I COULD NOT BE MORE SATISFIED. THE COFFEE TASTE AND THE COFFEE MAKER ARE BOTH EXCELLENT.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE HURST

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. Makes 2 cups. If you don’t overfill with beans/grinds and you clean it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: ARZ

customer_reviews.title: MUST READ FINE PRINT
customer_reviews.text: NEVER USED .. just opened box and it is NOT as described.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Farley

customer_reviews.title: very noisy
customer_reviews.text: The intent was to take this coffee maker to work but the bean grounder is too noisy. It makes good coffee.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miyata

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, not so easy to clean and seems a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: I didn't break, but it seems very fragile. It's very compact, which is good, it's easy to use, and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A GEM -- SMALL, BEAUTIFUL, OUTSTANDING.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed. Very easy to use. Quick brewing. Great tasting coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkor Bozdogan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish design and high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Best compact fresh brewed coffee maker. Fast, efficient and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing in all aspects
customer_reviews.text: Not a substitute for making your own pour over. It does a very bad job at grinding the beans, most are left whole. Also takes very little beans at a time so you are left with weak coffee. Leaves a good bit of ground mess in the actual coffee pot. Overall very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth at all Viante CAF-50 grind coffee
customer_reviews.text: I turned on for first time and it’s completely burned and not working !!! I seen the smoke coming out of the machine after gives me quarter cup of coffee!!!! The grinding sound was totally wrong and noisy !!! I don’t have any idea if you care after selling and will take care to fix it or return my bucks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Dashti

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item was not what i expected. It was too small for my damily needs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee every day, until today
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this was. But today suddenly the water didn't flow down into the carafe. I haven't had it that long. I tried several times to make a pot but it appears to have broken for no apparent reason.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!! Actually just don’t do it.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! I loved this coffee maker for the months it worked. But it quit after a few months and even though it says it has a warranty, their customer service does not exist. I’ve left emails, voicemails...they never return them and never answer the phone no matter what time of the day it is. I’m sure the problem is the dumb little spring, but I’ll never know because they won’t call me back. The idea of a coffee pot that had a built in grinder is great, but don’t get this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fresh ground, fresh brewed morning coffee (and any other time)
customer_reviews.text: It took a little getting used to, but now I love it! It doesn't take much space at all and stays on the counter next to my husband's "keurig" which does take up space. I love the smell of fresh ground and it makes just enough for 2 large cups or 3-4 small cups. I can add cinnamon in with the beans which I love and is good for me! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Downing

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Great built in grinder, but it beeps incessantly and takes a long time to brew. You can’t forgo the grinding process if you put in already ground coffee. It still churns. Smaller amount of coffee than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact but needs design update.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how nice and compact this is, its perfect in that sense. But the design needs to be updated, there are too many little things that ruin the experience. a) Quite messy, spend too much time cleaning after every use. b) Finicky, the drip doesn't automatically happen, have to wiggle the cup. Overall requires too much work from my end.
customer_reviews.author: akius

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We chose this Coffee maker because of its size, how it looked, and the previous reviews. It works really well, the compact design is perfect because it doesn't take up too much space on the counter, and it makes just enough coffee for two people, or two cups for one person!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, when it works
customer_reviews.text: Used this coffee maker twice and it worked as advertised. After that, the "power on" button no longer worked. Returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Vimont

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Save your money this machine malfunction after three days , the little tab that MUST meet the coffee pot lid did NOT go up and when I tried to see if I could adjust it the thing broke and now I can’t put it back so it’s going on the trash can ! 🤬
customer_reviews.author: SIOBLOOM

customer_reviews.title: WARNING this company doesn't honor warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ten months ago. Up until now it worked great, but now it is about time to junk it. It just stopped working right. It is too expensive to replace after less than a year of service.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adrian Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Loud, small and returned
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to,love this for small guest cottage. Looks besutiful but complicated tof guests, very loud and very small cup of coffee for all the trouble
customer_reviews.author: Northern CA

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver with Perks!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine. it's very small and fits nicely in a 12x12" space (with breathing room) It brews quickly, and is fairly easy to clean... the carafe is glass so it doesn't keep the coffee warm, but it only makes two cups, so that's not really a problem. Great deal for the $$$. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JC Simon

customer_reviews.title: Love and fear
customer_reviews.text: Love the compact coffee maker. Only problem that scared me was when i pulled the plug out sparks came out
customer_reviews.author: Judy h

customer_reviews.title: Simply do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The machine will dye on you just outside the return window. There's a design flaw in the spring and eventually water/coffee will no longer flow into the carafe. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I held off reviewing for a couple of months to try it out. First few runs I did taste plastic but that soon disappeared. Been on the Keurig for years and forgotten what good perked coffee taste like as opposed to steam infusion. I love it, super easy to clean and no paper filters.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S. 😎

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot pulls the grinds into the water flow and into the pot. It’s constantly getting clogged, because of this. I have only owned 1 month and have had more issues with it than good coffee out of it ... so bummed
customer_reviews.author: Donielle Newton

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: With no disposable filter I have to wash it out after tossing most of the ground coffee! It’s worth the better coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Makes fabulous coffee without any cups for the landfill
customer_reviews.text: This little grind and brew coffee maker masters my morning coffee. Taking it apart was a puzzle at first but is now second nature. I would recommend to anyone who wants beautiful coffee without contributing to the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: the sandy mom

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. Best grind and brew machine for the price. Plan to buy others for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: EMD

customer_reviews.title: Useful appliance
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have in a home of a non coffee drinker for caffeine addicted quests
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Gronkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Grind or ground
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker can be used with either ground or whole beans (and it grinds for you.) Great little unit. A good value for my wife who drinks coffee every day.
customer_reviews.author: Stosh

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problems as other reviewers with the coffee not draining into the pot, and with it leaking all over, and having coffee grounds in the pot. It is junk and going into the trash. I loved the compact size
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Compact but an all in one for coffee
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was small. I don't like that it appears flimsy (all plastic). I am not a coffee aficionado but it works well enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like the fresh ground coffee and did not like the 1-2 cup contender. Overall good coffee ☕️ machine...
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Howard

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: awful. Broke after 6 months. It wont turn on anymore
customer_reviews.author: frank a

product_meta.title: Viante Mini Grind and Brew Coffee Maker with built in Coffee Grinder | Bean to Cup Machine Uses Whole Coffee Beans or Ground Coffee | 4 Cups Glass Carafe | Coffee Strength Selector | Compact Size
